column4: im doing a dpkg-buildpackage and it does all its checking but then fails with make  make[1] entering directory `home/jasuus/gnucash/gnucasu-2.24'   then it says ***no targets specified and no makefile found Stop.       Theres a makefile right in the directory
are you building a package from the repository source?
did you do 'sudo apt-get build-dep gnucash'?
you are editing the package before building right?
no, does the package build from a fresh 'apt-get source' without any modifications for you?
let me try to build it here
this is all I did: sudo apt-get build-dep gnucash; sudo apt-get source gnucash; cd gnucash-2.2.4; dpkg-buildpackage -rfakeroot -uc -us -b
start over running only that sequence of commands and pastebin the error you get
make sure you are in a new directory so that you actually download it to a clean place
